Esselte AB, the Stockholm office supplies company, as expected, proposed to acquire the 22% it doesn't own of its U.S. unit, Esselte Business Systems Inc.    The price in the proposal is $43.50 for each of the 4.9 million shares the parent doesn't own, or $213.2 million.
